answers.answer: Dunno about the fluid. But you have to do the GTT each pregnancy.  My friends mom never had diabetes until her 5th kid. Each pregnancy is a fresh slate.
I'm not sure what 2 much fluid means either.  When my mom was pregnant with my brother they said that she had enough fluid for 2 babies in there and he was perfectly fine

question: I went for my 24 week scan last week and was told there is to much fluid around my baby I'm very worried because I don't understand what this means I have my gtt on monday but have no signs of diabeties and didn't have it in my 1st pregnancy can anyone help me please
title: to much water
